name: Fresh Start
description:
After a long sentence, your character is released under parole. You get to witness their conflicted feelings on the situation and help them take decisions that influence their chances to get by or go back to jail to finish their time there.

Made for the tyranobuilder 2017 game jam.

For a more in depth reasoning as to why it's made like this, feel free to check This patreon post once finished playing it!
